entry.title: Turkey's Economic Turmoil Sends Desperation and Inflation Soaring
entry.content: President Erdogan has taken control of the economy and pushed lower interest rates as the currency plunges. Turks have been lining up for subsidized bread and cutting back on meat.

entry.title: Europe Sees Boost in Uptake of Shots but Mandates AreStill on the Table
entry.content: Relentless pressure to raise vaccination rates in Europe is beginning to bear fruit, but pockets of resistance to the shots mean some countries are leaning toward general vaccine mandates.
